main event: An observer reported seeing a bright orange rectangular object with a tail in Waco, Texas on April 2, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as bright orange and rectangular with a tail,The observer saw the object come from the southwest, pass overhead, and disappear to the northeast,The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds,No sound was associated with the object,The weather conditions were CAVU (Ceiling And Visibility Unlimited) at the time of the observation.
sighted object: bright orange rectangular object with a tail
witness description: a couple standing outside their home in North Waco
